note: This data omits children who don't attend school. Learning outcomes over time should be interpreted with caution.
title: Share of students achieving minimum reading proficiency in early primary education
subtitle: Minimum reading proficiency for early [primary](#dod:primary-education) education means students in grade 2 can read familiar words and extract information from sentences, while in grade 3, they read aloud fluently, understand short texts, and identify the main topic.

display.name: Share of students in early primary education achieving at least minimum reading proficiency
